meta.author: Vincent LISITA
meta.title: Vincent LISITA's Portfolio
meta.description: Front-end developer specializing in React, NextJS, SvelteKit, and SolidJS. Expert in TypeScript and TailwindCSS for modern web interfaces.

about.title: About me
about.p1: After several years as a family caregiver, I decided to pursue my passion for web development by becoming self-taught. For over a year, I have specialized in JavaScript and more particularly in the React library.
about.p2: Passionate about creating innovative and intuitive user interfaces, I am constantly looking for new knowledge to improve my front-end development skills.
